roleset.name: insert a stent to prevent closure

example.name: With Arg1
example.text: There is a long restonotic zone in the proximal main obtuse marginal vessel that-1 [*-1]-2 was dilated and stented [*-2]previously.
example.arg: a long restonotic zone in the proximal main obtuse marginal vessel

roleset.note: STENT-V NOTES: Based on data from medical clinical notes corpus. No VNcls. (from stent.01-v)
